track.name: Give it away
track.review: The first single off the Red Hot Chili Peppers' quadruple-platinum smash Blood Sugar Sex Magik, "Give It Away" didn't achieve the massive pop success of its follow-up, "Under the Bridge," barely peaking in the Top 75, but it did become one of the band's most instantly recognizable songs, thanks mostly to Anthony Kiedis' nonsensical raps, Flea's jumping, sliding, popping bass line, and Pete Weiss' jew's-harp boinging away in the background.
